channel.title: Melanie Manchot on Artangled

item.title: The Forest | Parafin
item.description: I’ve always liked a good thematic group show, and this one at Parafin didn’t disappoint. The theme is ’the forest’, which are part of our shared consciousness, even for those of us who live in the middle of large cities. Across different cultures and times, the forest represents a quiet place to retreat to and hide. But it’s also a lonely place, where monsters may lurk. The exhibition begins with an engraving from the mystical French artist Gustave Doré to set the scene.
